thread.title: Polar Vortex Behind Freeze Warning In Georgia? Weather Updates Here
thread.title_full: Polar Vortex Behind Freeze Warning In Georgia? Weather Updates Here

author: @TIMESNOW
title: Polar Vortex Behind Freeze Warning In Georgia? Weather Updates Here
text:
Polar Vortex Behind Freeze Warning In Georgia? Weather Updates Here
Cobb and north Georgia are under a freeze warning from 9 p.m. Wednesday through 10 a.m. Thursday, according to the National Weather Service in Peachtree City. After some overnight rain, blustery weather conditions are persisting, and a wind advisory is in force until 7 p.m. on Wednesday.
Freeze Warning issued in Georgia (Photo Credits: X / Twitter)
Cobb and north Georgiaare under a
freeze warningfrom 9 p.m. Wednesday through 10 a.m. Thursday, according to the National Weather Service in Peachtree City. After some overnight rain, blustery weather conditions are persisting, and a wind advisory is in force until 7 p.m. on Wednesday.
The cold air is likely to deliver light snow to higher elevations such as the plateau, southwest Virginia, and the mountain foothills. A dusting to an inch of snow is likely throughout the plateau and Cumberland Mountains, which stretch into southwest Virginia.
Areas Likely To Be Affected
Hall
Banks
Jackson
Madison
Gwinnett
Barrow
Clarke
Oconee
Oglethorpe
DeKalb
Wilkes
Rockdale
Walton
Newton
Morgan
Harris
Talbot
Bartow
Dade
Walker
Wind gusts of 15 to 20 mph are expected to persist on Thursday morning before the sun and milder temperatures arrive. It is predicted that Thursday will see highs in the mid-50s and lows in the mid-30s once more.
There is a 50% chance of rain on Saturday night, with lows in the mid-40s, and highs in the 60s on Friday and Saturday.
Are The Weather Conditions Due To A
Polar Vortex?The current and predicted weather conditions come after a recent polar vortex alert was issued across US ,Canada and European nations. The polar vortex will break and distribute chilly weather over the United States. This will also be the vortex's disappearance act.
Severe Weather Europe reports that this is the second and last disruption of the Polar Vortex in 2025.
